Posts.Content: mona1 wrote: I have gone to my oncologist afer finishing surgery, 4 Ac + 4 taxol, radiation and one year of Herceptin. He is recommennding another year of herceptin. Altough the results of HERA study is not out yet, he thinks having two years of Herceptin might be better. Any opinion?
